title: FB Live 8/19/20 - How often should I weigh myself?
itunes:title: FB Live 8/19/20 - How often should I weigh myself?
description:
Each week I go live to answer questions from 1000's of listeners of the podcast. If you're a regular viewer you know I cut through the shit and give it to you straight. This is one of my favorite ways to help you lose weight the way you want to live your life.
 
In this episode, I answer questions like:
-How do I get over the anger I feel because I have to do extra work to lose weight than other family members?
 
-How do you “level up” with alcohol?
 
-What do you do if you’ve already made your plan for the day and a spontaneous lunch or dinner pops up?Every week I'm here helping you figure out weightloss.
Make sure you join me each Wednesday at 8:30am CST at www.facebook.com/pnpgirl See you there!
 
Get the Free Course here:
http://phit.click/freecourse
